verbs.description: [ARG0: attorneys] [V: call] [ARG1: for termination of nypd officer in stun - gun video] the legal aid society is calling for the termination of an nypd officer following the controversial arrest of a port richmond man we are appalled that there are still officers serving this community and our communities of color using such brute force upon our citizens said chris pisciotta attorney - in - charge of the staten island criminal defense practice at legal aid society this must stop now attorneys representing 24-year - old william colon held a press conference wednesday outside the staten island courthouse along with colon mother and members of local activist groups police responded to colon home sept 28 for a report of domestic violence once inside an officer identified as vincenzo trabolse forces himself on top of the 4-foot 8-inch 85-pound colon then punches and uses a stun gun to subdue him according to video footage released by the legal aid society var youtubeembedinfo youtubeembedinfo youtubeembedinfo push div player i7uu36ucvos i d i7uu36ucvos colon mother spoke at the press conference wednesday about her initial reaction to the video no mother should bear the horrific sight of her child being manhandled by the police over a crime that he did not commit said sonia adorno staten island is officer trabolse sonia adorno the legal aid society staten island criminal defense n y dale smith port richmond nypd legal aid society staten island vincenzo trabolse new york city police department officer chris pisciotta william colon attorney michael e mcmahon staten island courthouse
